public static LikeOptions getUserLikeOptions(Context context)
Returns the default sharing options for the user.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
Returns:
The default sharing options for the user.

like

public static void like(Activity context,
                        Entity entity,
                        LikeAddListener listener)
Records a like against the given entity for the current user. This method will also prompt the user to share their like.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
entity - The entity to be liked.
listener - A listener to handle the result.

like

public static void like(Activity context,
                        Entity entity,
                        LikeOptions likeOptions,
                        LikeAddListener listener,
                        SocialNetwork... networks)
Records a like against the given entity for the current user. This method will NOT prompt the user to share their like.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
entity - The entity to be liked.
likeOptions - Optional parameters for the like.
listener - A listener to handle the result.
networks - 0 or more networks on which to share the like.

unlike

public static void unlike(Activity context,
                          String entityKey,
                          LikeDeleteListener listener)
Removes a like previously created for the current user.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
entityKey - The entity that was liked.
listener - A listener to handle the result.

makeLikeButton

public static void makeLikeButton(Activity context,
                                  CompoundButton button,
                                  Entity entity,
                                  LikeButtonListener listener)
Turns a regular CompoundButton (CheckBox, ToggleButton etc) into a Socialize Like button.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
button - The button to be converted.
entity - The entity that is to be liked.
listener - A Listener to handle changes in button state.
